entry.RedBlue: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
entry.Yellow: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.
entry.Gold: Its 80 tentacles absorb water and stretch almost endlessly to CONSTRICT its prey and enemies.
entry.Silver: In battle, it extends all 80 of its tentacles to entrap its opponent inside a poisonous net.
entry.Crystal: When its 80 feelers absorb water, it stretches to become like a net to entangle its prey.
entry.Ruby: TENTACRUEL has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This POKéMON’s outburst creates rough waves around it.
entry.Sapphire: TENTACRUEL has tentacles that can be freely elongated and shortened at will. It ensnares prey with its tentacles and weakens the prey by dosing it with a harsh toxin. It can catch up to 80 prey at the same time.
entry.FireRed: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain.
entry.LeafGreen: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
entry.Emerald: It lives in complex rock formations on the ocean floor and traps prey using its 80 tentacles. Its red orbs glow when it grows excited or agitated.
entry.Diamond: With 80 tentacles for ensnaring victims, it prevents escape until the prey is weakened by poison.
entry.Pearl: It alerts others to danger by stridently flashing the red orbs on its head.
entry.Platinum: It extends its 80 tentacles to form an encircling poisonous net that is difficult to escape.
entry.HeartGold: Its 80 tentacles absorb water and stretch almost endlessly to constrict its prey and enemies.
entry.SoulSilver: In battle, it extends all 80 of its tentacles to entrap its opponent inside a poisonous net.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It extends its 80 tentacles to form an encircling poisonous net that is difficult to escape.
entry.X: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
entry.Y: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain.
entry.Omega Ruby: Tentacruel has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This Pokémon’s outburst creates rough waves around it.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Tentacruel has tentacles that can be freely elongated and shortened at will. It ensnares prey with its tentacles and weakens the prey by dosing it with a harsh toxin. It can catch up to 80 prey at the same time.
entry.Sun: Normally, it has 80 poisonous tentacles. The longer one has been alive, the fewer tentacles it will have.
entry.Moon: Although these Pokémon are rare, when a large outbreak of them occurs, all fish Pokémon disappear from the surrounding sea.
